COMMENT_TX: $50th Anniversary of 1933 game, held again in Comiskey Park Managers: Harvey Kuenn (AL Milwaukee), Whitey Herzog (NL St. Louis); MVP: Fred Lynn (CAL) who hit first slam in history; Records: 7 runs in an inning (ALS-3rd); most hits off a pitcher in an inning (6 off Atlee Hammaker in the 3rd)
$record 13 runs for one team, surpassing 12 (AL) in 1946
